RTCCertificateStatsBase64Certificate.summary: The base64Certificate property of the dictionary is a string containing the base-64 representation of the DER-encoded certificate.

remarks.para: This is essentially an encoding of the original certificate as a string that can safely serialized and deserialized when sent over an IP network.

RTCCertificateStatsBase64Certificate.value: A Base64 representation of the DER-encoded certificate.
